titlestmt.titleproper: Commonwealth Fund records, Healthy Steps for Young Children Program, SG 2, Series 6
A Guide to the Commonwealth Fund records, Healthy Steps for Young Children Program, SG 2, Series 6 FA498

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2025-01-01 05:02:20 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Commonwealth Fund records, Healthy Steps for Young Children Program, SG 2, Series 6

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains documentation of the Healthy Steps for Young Children program, from its inception through the mid-2000s, including planning documents, correspondence, reports, program and site evaluations, and related grant records.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Sub-Series: 1. Chronologocial Files; 2. Evaluations; 3. General Files; 4. Grants; 5. Meetings; 6. Working Papers; 7. Program Reports; 8. Reports and Surveys; 9. Publications; and 10. Special Formats.
Within each subseries file arrangements are in chronlogical, reverse chronological and/or Alphabetical order.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.
